Quartets of Evil

悪(あく)ノ(ノ)四重奏(カルテット)aku NO KARUTETTO

978-4-569-82202-0

Quartets of Evil is a yonkoma manga by Tamara (たまらtamara) based on characters and events from The Evillious Chronicles. It was released on December 20, 2014.

Trailer · Scanlation
